title: Chicken & Fettuccine Alfredo
instructions: Pound chicken breasts between plastic wrap to 1/4 to 1/2 inch thickness. Season with salt and pepper.
Prepare three shallow dishes: one with flour, salt, and pepper; one with beaten eggs; and one with panko and Parmesan.
Dredge chicken in flour, then egg, then panko/Parmesan mixture. Place on a baking sheet.
Fry chicken in olive oil and butter until golden brown, about 3 minutes per side. Drain on paper towels.
Cook fettuccine al dente, then drain.
In a skillet, saute garlic in butter, then whisk in cream until slightly thickened. Add Parmesan and white pepper.
Toss drained pasta in the Alfredo sauce.
Serve the fettuccine with the chicken. Garnish with lemon wedges and parsley.
